name: PawPrint
description: This is a game for people who have lost their cats in real life. The natural longevity of humans and cats determines that it is often humans who accept the sudden departure of cats, they will die naturally, ill or silently leave the warmth of cats will never disappear. In this game, players can DIY their favorite cat image, including cat fat and thin, hair length, cat hair color and graffiti. At the same time, players can earn gold coins, buy cat food, cans and other goods in the cat planet scene, and continue to complete the fate of feeding and accompanying cats. You can also keep writing about your cat by keeping a journal. This is a warm casual simulation game, hopefully can bring people comfort. The world is broken, the cat is patched up, and it never leaves until you forget it.
